description:
### 11.151 lut3d

Apply a 3D LUT to an input video.


The filter accepts the following options:


- **`file`**
  - Set the 3D LUT file name.
Currently supported formats:
‘
3dl
’
AfterEffects
‘
cube
’
Iridas
‘
dat
’
DaVinci
‘
m3d
’
Pandora
‘
csp
’
cineSpace
- **`interp`**
  - Select interpolation mode.
Available values are:
‘
nearest
’
Use values from the nearest defined point.
‘
trilinear
’
Interpolate values using the 8 points defining a cube.
‘
tetrahedral
’
Interpolate values using a tetrahedron.
‘
pyramid
’
Interpolate values using a pyramid.
‘
prism
’
Interpolate values using a prism.
Set the 3D LUT file name.


Currently supported formats:


- **`‘3dl’`**
  - AfterEffects
- **`‘cube’`**
  - Iridas
- **`‘dat’`**
  - DaVinci
- **`‘m3d’`**
  - Pandora
- **`‘csp’`**
  - cineSpace
AfterEffects


Iridas


DaVinci


Pandora


cineSpace


Select interpolation mode.


Available values are:


- **`‘nearest’`**
  - Use values from the nearest defined point.
- **`‘trilinear’`**
  - Interpolate values using the 8 points defining a cube.
- **`‘tetrahedral’`**
  - Interpolate values using a tetrahedron.
- **`‘pyramid’`**
  - Interpolate values using a pyramid.
- **`‘prism’`**
  - Interpolate values using a prism.
Use values from the nearest defined point.


Interpolate values using the 8 points defining a cube.


Interpolate values using a tetrahedron.


Interpolate values using a pyramid.


Interpolate values using a prism.
name: lut3d

options.description:
Set the 3D LUT file name.

Currently supported formats:

‘3dl’

AfterEffects

‘cube’

Iridas

‘dat’

DaVinci

‘m3d’

Pandora

‘csp’

cineSpace
options.name: file

choices.help: process only first CLUT, ignore rest
choices.name: first

choices.help: use values from the nearest defined points
choices.name: nearest

choices.help: interpolate values using the 8 points defining a cube
choices.name: trilinear

options.description:
Select interpolation mode.

Available values are:

‘nearest’

Use values from the nearest defined point.

‘trilinear’

Interpolate values using the 8 points defining a cube.

‘tetrahedral’

Interpolate values using a tetrahedron.

‘pyramid’

‘prism’

options.name: interp
